result.eng: A sentence in the future tense.
result.html: Abairt san aimsir fháistineachA sentence in the future tense.
result.ponchtml: Abairt san aimsir ḟáistineaċA sentence in the future tense.

result.eng: We will be needing more money in the future.
result.ga: Beidh tuilleadh airgid ag teastáil uainn amach anseo
result.orig: Beidh tuilleadh airgid ag teastáil uainn amach anseo
result.html: Beidh tuilleadh airgid ag teastáil uainn amach anseoWe will be needing more money in the future.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tuilleaḋ airgid ag teastáil uainn amaċ anseoWe will be needing more money in the future.

result.eng: What will you do in the future?
result.html: Cad a dhéanfaidh tú feastaWhat will you do in the future?
result.ponchtml: Cad a ḋéanfaiḋ tú feastaWhat will you do in the future?

result.eng: It is a big cause for hope for the future.
result.ga: An-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea é
result.orig: An-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea é
result.html: An-údar dóchais don dtodhchaí is ea éIt is a big cause for hope for the future.
result.ponchtml: An-údar dóċais don dtoḋċaí is ea éIt is a big cause for hope for the future.
